title: Icyene

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Icyene are a race of incredibly long-lived winged humanoid beings who arrived in Gielinor during the Second Age. The Icyene were aligned to the god Saradomin and are some of his most powerful followers. The Icyene conquered and inhabited the area known as Hallowvale during the Second Age along with humans. Hallowvale became one of Saradomin's most powerful settlements.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Icyene
Commander Zilyana, an Icyene.

The Icyene are a race of incredibly long-lived winged humanoid beings who arrived in Gielinor during the Second Age. The Icyene were aligned to the god Saradomin and are some of his most powerful followers. The Icyene conquered and inhabited the area known as Hallowvale during the Second Age along with humans. Hallowvale became one of Saradomin's most powerful settlements.

When Zaros, ruler of the area north-west of Hallowvale and other areas such as Forinthry, was dethroned by his Mahjarrat general Zamorak, the God Wars began. Many Icyene were deployed from Hallowvale to help Saradomin in the war. Because trained Icyene have the potential to be extremely powerful, they were very useful to Saradomin's armies.

It is assumed that the Icyene were wiped out during the God Wars due to there being no known Icyene other than Commander Zilyana who was frozen in the God Wars Dungeon, when the Edicts of Guthix were put in place.


A stained glass window portraying an Icyene.
A stained glass window portraying an Icyene.


Notable Icyene[edit | edit source]

  • Commander Zilyana - Saradomin's favoured general and the leader of his forces in the God Wars Dungeon.
  • Queen Efaritay - Former ruler of Hallowvale who once resided at Ver Sinhaza.
  • Safalaan Hallow - A half-blood Icyene - Currently leader of Sanguinesti Myreque.
  • Larina Hallow - Half-blood Icyene, daughter of Queen Efaritay and King Ascertes and sister of Safalaan.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • An Icyene is depicted on the stained glass window in the Saradominist church in Hosidius.
  • A similar albeit darker version can be seen in the Zamorakian church in Slepe.

{{External|rs}}
[[File:Commander Zilyana.png|thumb|200px|[[Commander Zilyana]], an Icyene.]]
The '''Icyene''' are a race of incredibly long-lived winged humanoid beings who arrived in [[Gielinor]] during the [[Second Age]]. The Icyene were aligned to the god [[Saradomin]] and are some of his most powerful followers. The Icyene conquered and inhabited the area known as [[Hallowvale]] during the Second Age along with [[human]]s. Hallowvale became one of Saradomin's most powerful settlements.

When [[Zaros]], ruler of the area north-west of Hallowvale and other areas such as [[Forinthry]], was dethroned by his [[Mahjarrat]] general [[Zamorak]], the [[God Wars]] began. Many Icyene were deployed from Hallowvale to help Saradomin in the war. Because trained Icyene have the potential to be extremely powerful, they were very useful to Saradomin's armies.

It is assumed that the Icyene were wiped out during the God Wars due to there being no known Icyene other than [[Commander Zilyana]] who was frozen in the [[God Wars Dungeon]], when the [[Edicts of Guthix]] were put in place.


[[File:Icyene window.png|thumb|200px|A stained glass window portraying an Icyene.]]
[[File:Dark Icyene window.png|thumb|200px|A stained glass window portraying an Icyene.]]


==Notable Icyene==
*[[Commander Zilyana]] - [[Saradomin]]'s favoured general and the leader of his forces in the [[God Wars Dungeon]].
*[[Queen Efaritay]] - Former ruler of [[Hallowvale]] who once resided at [[Ver Sinhaza]].
*[[Safalaan|Safalaan Hallow]] - A half-blood Icyene - Currently leader of Sanguinesti [[Myreque]].
*[[Larina Hallow]] - Half-blood Icyene, daughter of Queen Efaritay and [[King Ascertes]] and sister of Safalaan.

==Trivia==
*An Icyene is depicted on the stained glass window in the Saradominist church in [[Hosidius]]. 
*A similar albeit darker version can be seen in the Zamorakian church in [[Slepe]].
